optimized_title: KAKSS Neoprene Dumbbells Set, 3 Pairs 2lb 3lb 5lb (20lb Total) with Stand, Hex Cast Iron Hand Weights Dumbbells Set for Women and Men, Non-Slip Gym Weights for Home Gym Equipment

image_analysis.product_name: KAKSS Neoprene Workout Fixed Weight Dumbbell (Proudly Made In India) (20-Pound Total - 3 Pairs (2Lb,3Lb,5Lb) With Stand)
image_analysis.size: 1.5 KG shown in images; listing mentions 2 lb, 3 lb, 5 lb set (20 lb total)
image_analysis.quantity: Listing: 3 pairs with stand; images show single pairs and multiple pairs on a rack
key_features: Dumbbell hand weights for exercise and resistance training
Ideal for fitness classes, home gym, or workout area
Cast iron construction with neoprene coating for durability and safety
Neoprene coating provides a non-slip grip
Printed weight number on each end cap
Color coded for quick weight identification
Hexagonal shape prevents dumbbells from rolling away
image_analysis.usage: Used for strength training, resistance exercises, and fitness workouts at home, in classes, or in a gym area.
image_analysis.target_audience: People setting up a home gym, fitness enthusiasts, and individuals attending or leading workout and fitness classes.
image_analysis.ai_description: Compact hexagonal dumbbells with a smooth neoprene-coated surface in bright pink, purple, and teal tones. Each end cap is flat with the KAKSS logo and weight clearly printed in white. The coated cast-iron heads and matching handle create a solid, non-slip grip for home workouts.

comparison_points.our_benefit: Solid cast iron core with neoprene coat resists cracking and chipping over time
comparison_points.competitor_issue: Cheap vinyl-filled dumbbells split or leak sand after a few months of use

comparison_points.our_benefit: Textured neoprene grip stays secure even with sweaty hands for safer lifting
comparison_points.competitor_issue: Smooth plastic handles get slippery, forcing users to stop and wipe constantly

comparison_points.our_benefit: Hex shape and included stand keep all 3 pairs stable and organized in small spaces
comparison_points.competitor_issue: Round dumbbells roll under furniture and clutter floors without any storage rack

comparison_points.our_benefit: Color-coded 2/3/5 lb set with printed weights makes quick changes during circuits easy
comparison_points.competitor_issue: Unmarked or faded weights slow workouts as users guess or recheck each dumbbell
